animeDescription: Based on a manga by Morita Kenji.Household robot Robotan, made by a nerdy school boy named Kan-chan, lives with an everyday Japanese family as a domestic servant and friend to the children.(Source: AniDB)
animeStaff: [['Honey Knights', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Taniguchi, Moriyasu', 'Animation Director'], ['Morita, Kenji', 'Original Creator, Animation Director']]
